report.title: Parishes summary
report.description: Lists the Parishes with basic metadata.
report.query: select #columns# from locations l join locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.website_id=8 and lw.deleted=false left join (cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id and length(snf.public_entered_sref::text)>=8 ) on o.website_id=8 and st_intersects(l.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) and o.record_status<>'R' where l.location_type_id=702 and l.deleted=false

column.name: record_count_verified
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.record_status='V' then o.id else null end)

column.name: species_count_verified
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.record_status='V' then o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key else null end)
